div.p: responsible: National Council for Prescription Drug Programs (NCPDP)
description: The NCPDP Reject Code (511-FB) code set contains exception definitions for use when transaction processing cannot be completed.
jurisdiction: United States of America (Details : {urn:iso:std:iso:3166 code 'US' = 'United States of America)
usage: Used to convey exceptions when transaction processing cannot be completed.
